name: Project: Save Mars
description:
Its the year 2786, and humans have finally made contact with alien life. The bad news is that the aliens want to steal mars, which humans wanted to terraform to a second earth. Humanity has put together their best astronaut soldiers to resist the evil aliens and take back mars, but the aliens captured everyone in the resistance except for you. Now the fate of mars is in your hands, will you be enough to stop the aliens or will earth's resistance be for nothing?

What to do: Shoot at mars until the number below is zero. Every time you shoot, 10 aliens will be launched into outer space, removing them from mars. Avoid the aliens flying around, you can shoot at them to make them go away. To shoot, click on the screen.

Made with Clickteam Fusion: https://www.clickteam.com/

Main bg music: https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/royalty-free-music/downloads-c/8-bit-music/6

End sfx: https://mixkit.co/free-sound-effects/game/?page=2
